edu.mit.lib.bagit

Class Loader

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mit.lib.bagit.Loader

  • public class Loader
extends java.lang.Object
    Loader is a Bag builder class that interprets bag serializations and other manfestations as Bags. It also exposes methods allowing clients to fill bag 'holes' (fetch.txt contents), and updates the bag to reflect this. See README for sample invocations and API description.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Loader(java.io.InputStream in, java.lang.String format)
      Returns a new Loader (bag loader) instance using passed I/O stream and format with bag in a temporary directory location
      Loader(java.nio.file.Path file)
      Returns a new Loader (bag loader) instance using passed file (loose directory or archive file)
      Loader(java.nio.file.Path parent, java.io.InputStream in, java.lang.String format)
      Returns a new Loader (bag loader) instance using passed I/O stream and format with bag in the passed directory location

        format - the expected serialization format

        public Bag seal()
         throws java.io.IOException
        Returns sealed Bag from Loader. Sealed Bags cannot be serialized.
        Returns:
        bag the loaded sealed Bag instance
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if error loading bag
